item.title: Backup Your Gmail and Google Apps While You Can
item.description:
A lot of us utilize Gmail and other Google services for work due to their ease of use and affordability. However, a major drawback is the lack of robust data recovery options in case of accidental deletions or other mishaps. Imagine accidentally deleting crucial contact information from your Gmail account. Without a backup, that data would be lost forever. While Google doesn’t provide a native backup solution, third-party services like Backupify bridge the gap...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/backup-your-gmail-and-google-apps-while-you-can/
